mapper.sql: expect, openCode, kindOf, status, openTime, startTime, endTime, createTime
mapper.select:
select
from lottery_issue where kindOf=#{kindOf} and startTime <= NOW() and endTime > NOW() and status = 0

select
from lottery_issue where kindOf=#{kindOf} and endTime < NOW() order by startTime desc limit 1;

select
from lottery_issue where kindOf=#{kindOf} and expect = #{expect}
select kindOf from lottery_issue group by kindOf;
mapper.insert: insert into lottery_issue ( id, expect, kindOf, status, endTime, startTime ) values (UUID(), #{issue.expect}, #{issue.kindOf}, 0 , #{issue.endTime}, #{issue.startTime})
